definitions: in a sober and conventional way

examples.text: they've been dressing more conservatively at the office
an upscale living room, conservatively furnished

definitions: in a cautious way that seeks to avoid potential risks

examples.text: she conservatively estimates a supply shortfall of $8 million this year

shortDefinitions: in cautious way that seeks to avoid potential risks

definitions: in a way that is intended to control symptoms rather than eliminate a condition

examples.text: the frostbite injury was treated conservatively

shortDefinitions: in way that is intended to control symptoms rather than eliminate a condition
